name: DuckDuckEel!
description:
DuckDuckEel!

This is a silly little game I made in a couple of hours on a rainy weekend with Unity and Playmaker.

You play as a hungry duck trying to eat some delicious water plants - and avoid getting hit by the Evil Eel. 

Try to rack up the highest score you can!

How to play:

  • Left/Right arrows: Move the duck
  • Down arrow (hold): Eat a plant
